) a ) a where phv_rn = 1 ) a where sql_rn = 1 ) select /* sqasMapper.xml/getSqlareaList - ns: SqlAreaMapper by rohys03 */ /*+ ordered use_hash(b) no_swap_join_inputs(b) */ b.inst_id instId, b.sql_id sqlId, b.plan_hash_value planHasshValue, b.parsing_schema_name parsingSchemaName, b.module module, case when b.program_id = 0 then null else b.program_id end as program_id, b.executions executions, round( b.buffer_gets / decode( b.executions, 0, 1, b.executions ) ) as blockPerExec, b.last_active_time lastActiveTime, b.first_load_time firstLoadTime, b.Command_type commandType, dbms_lob.substr( sql_fulltext, 2000, 1 ) as sqlText from sqlarea a, gv$sqlarea b where a.inst_id = b.inst_id and a.sql_id = b.sql_id and exists ( select /*+ unnest hash_sj push_subq swap_join_inputs(c) */ 'x' from dep c where a.address = c.from_address and a.hash_value = c.from_hash )
